title: Alabama infections pass 1,500 as stay-home order takes hold
description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) — Confirmed coronavirus infections in Alabama topped 1,500 on Saturday as residents statewide were placed under an emergency order requiring them to stay home as much as possible.
content:
MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) Confirmed coronavirus infections in Alabama topped 1,500 on Saturday as residents statewide were placed under an emergency order requiring them to stay home as much as possible.
Gov. Kay Ivey's order was scheduled to take effect at 5 p.… [+2094 chars]
